Class PermutationInterleaver

java.lang.Object
net.jnellis.interleave.AbstractInterleaver
net.jnellis.interleave.PermutationInterleaver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interleaver
public final class PermutationInterleaver extends AbstractInterleaver
An implementation of A Simple In-Place Algorithm for In-Shuffle
